title: jrrsparkles
author: jrrsparkles
content: Matthew Perry is known from the American series Friends with the name Chandler Bing.Almost everyone's childhood is filled with those scenes not just in the US but all over the world because it has been one of the top-viewed series until the recent past. Matthew Perry also suffered from Alchohol addiction which he survived and recovered after rough times.It's time to remember him and may his soul rest in peace.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: I haven't followed this series when I was young but it's part of my childhood and I used to see this on the TV schedules. Anyway, rest in paradise Matthew a.k.a Chandler of F.R.I.E.N.D.S.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: boyptc on November 02, 2023, 10:31:59 AMI haven't followed this series when I was young but it's part of my childhood and I used to see this on the TV schedules. For me, it is one of my favorites and if I am not wrong I watched the series at least 10 times which consists of 10 seasons and around 220-230 episodes. I find it strange that not many of the bitcointalk members aren't aware of friends series or atleast they didn't even care to reply here.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: jrrsparkles on November 02, 2023, 05:21:41 PMQuote from: boyptc on November 02, 2023, 10:31:59 AMI haven't followed this series when I was young but it's part of my childhood and I used to see this on the TV schedules. For me, it is one of my favorites and if I am not wrong I watched the series at least 10 times which consists of 10 seasons and around 220-230 episodes. I find it strange that not many of the bitcointalk members aren't aware of friends series or atleast they didn't even care to reply here. It's okay. Probably on their social media accounts, they've heard the news and they're not obliged to reply here on this thread. They can be fans forever and it's on their heart to remember Chandler as part of their young adulthood period.But on me, I've known the series but didn't watched or if I did probably just some short scenes from the commercials. Anyway, what's more sad? Is that all of us are growing older and these actors and legends are passing on our time.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: It is sad to hear of anyone passing when they are such a young age. Only 54 years old and to drown in your own home is very tragic way to pass.We know he did have history of drugs and alcohol abuse. I just only do hope he was not under the influence of anything when he passed. But it still does not matter and is a sad event.

comments.author: FinneysTrueVision
comments.body: Friends was one of the last shows I enjoyed together with my siblings before we became estranged. The show is iconic and brings back some pleasant memories. It's tragic when a beloved personality passes away prematurely. Due to global events this news might fly under the radar but his legacy will always remain as somebody who was able to bring joy to many people's lives.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well now the autopsy report is back and we know how Matthew Perry died. It was 'acute effects of ketamine’ that he was taking for his depression and anxiety.There was no other drugs or alcohol in his system said the coroner. It is a sad thing for a nice person like him to die at such a young age of only 54 years old.  https://www.cnn.com/2023/12/15/entertainment/matthew-perry-autopsy-report/index.html

comments.body: I have no idea what ketamine is but after doing some quick research, there are a lot of use on it. Maybe he was depressed back then and used it as a recreational drug. Quote from: mich on December 16, 2023, 07:54:41 AMIt is a sad thing for a nice person like him to die at such a young age of only 54 years old.  Well, there are too many nice guy that are living this world at an early age. So, we can't really time our lives and we don't know if we'll still see tomorrow but yeah, he's still young and there's more for his life but then that's how his journey ended.

comments.body: Quote from: rodskee on December 21, 2023, 12:18:35 PMthere will be a reunion of friends in which meaning this will never take place now because of Matthew's death .Actually, his death increases the chance of a reunion, since more people are interested and would watch for information/gossip.

comments.author: maisie53
comments.body: It’s a pity that such bright people leave so early, if there were any plans for a reunion or revival, then such an event is organized as a sign of respect for the departed colleague and team member. I think they'll find a way to honor Matthew's memory. The series "Friends" itself was amazing and funny. If you're not hooked, it's not surprising - everyone finds something in different shows that suits their tastes and mood, but there are very few series like this.
